00037 class MAIN_Cache
00038 {
00043         private $config;
00044 
00049         private $session;
00050 
00057         public function __construct(&$config, &$session) {
00058                 if(!($config instanceof MAIN_Config &&
00059                    $session instanceof OUT_Session)) {
00060                         throw new MAIN_Error(MAIN_Error::ERROR, 'MAIN_Cache::__construct', 'Invalid parameters.');
00061                 }
00062 
00063                 $this->config     =& $config;
00064                 $this->session    =& $session;
00065         }
00066 
00075         public function canBeCached($action) {
00076                 $cacheopts  = $this->config->getOption('cache');
00077                 return isset($cacheopts["action.$action"]) && $cacheopts["action.$action"] &&
00078                           $this->session->getText('REQUEST_METHOD', 'SERVER') != 'POST';
00079         }
00080 
00087         public function cacheExpired() {
00088                 $cacheopts = $this->config->getOption('cache');
00089                 $filename  = $this->getCacheFilename();
00090 
00091                 if( !file_exists($filename) ||
00092                     time() - $cacheopts['expires'] > filemtime($filename)) {
00093                         return true;
00094                 } return false;
00095         }
00096 
00106         public function storeCache($output) {
00107                 $filename  = $this->getCacheFilename();
00108                 $fp        = fopen($filename, 'w');
00109                 if($fp === false) {
00110                         return false;
00111                 } fwrite($output);
00112                 fclose($fp);
00113                 return true;
00114         }
00115 
00122         public function getCache() {
00123                 $filename  = $this->getCacheFilename();
00124                 date_default_timezone_set('America/New_York');
00125                 if(!file_exists($filename) || !is_readable($filename)) {
00126                         return false;
00127                 } return file_get_contents($filename) .
00128                           '\n<!-- Cached ' . date('jS F Y H:i', filemtime($filename)) . ' -->';
00129         }
00130 
00138         private function getCacheFilename() {
00139                 $paths = $this->config->getOption('paths');
00140                 $path  = isset($paths['cache']) ? $paths['cache'] : ROOTDIR . '/cache';
00141                 $uri   = $this->session->getText('REQUEST_URI', 'SERVER');
00142                 return $path . $uri;
00143         }
00144 }
